activities:
HR
Acquire and process personal data concerning employees, interns, applicants and independent contractors for the following purposes: to determine, evaluate and implement employment-related actions and obligations, including background checks; design, evaluate and administer compensation, benefits, stock options and other human resources programs; design, evaluate and implement education and training programs; monitor and evaluate conduct and performance of employees and independent contractors; manage and monitor company web tools, mailboxes, instant messaging and other company information systems; monitor and manage all forms of electronic and digital media and services for employees’ and independent contractors’ use; report statistics; for applicants, create a personal profile and access codes, validate identity of and evaluate applicants; monitor and manage employees’ and independent contractors’ professional travel and business expenses; assure compliance with company policy; other uses to support business activities and processes.

Business Activities
Personal information collected online and offline in connection with Dassault Systemes SolidWorks Corp’s   business activities, including (a) information concerning current, prospective and former: customers; suppliers and vendors; used in order monitor and manage relationships between the company and its business partners and stakeholders (e.g. suppliers, resellers, customers, potential customers) including (i) marketing (e.g. contacts, customer lists, system access rights. etc.) (ii) sales (sales opportunities, commercial offers, orders, contracts, invoices, etc.); (iii) purchases (offers, orders, contracts, invoices, etc.); (iv) customer relation and customer service purposes  and (v) research and development activities (e.g. development requests, incidents, quality, tests, manufacturing, etc.

Personal information collected online and offline in connection with Dassault Systemes SolidWorks Corp’s   business activities which include activities such as registration, authentication marketing, provision of  information about special offers, contests, training, upgrades, provision of support (directly or via partners) , provision of information about other software products and services from Dassault Systemes SolidWorks Corp’s or its affiliates. Use of information to improve software products, services and website

Personal data collected on or through the website to allow the website visitors and users to request information, have personalized interactive use of the website, open and maintain an account, subscribe to a commercial or support-type service, register for a seminar or other event, respond to a survey, enter a contest make online purchases of certain company products and access all the features and options offered by the website
eucountries: Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Data Covered: Online and Offline Human Resources, Customer, Prospect, Partner, Supplier data; Services Data
recoursemech: TRUSTe Dispute Resolution Program);EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)
